data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Ag4cyxA2RTcQ7kNvgGRJ9T4&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD9LxHycfG3zLRGzR-RM4RM19_8VKXwA5NjrGtDftV_Mw&oe=66AA1E37)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=oYbDmljKAG4Q7kNvgGpenqV&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDatnRy6jaRPSOxGCmfWJS1OmnxgHavphnJ0PobIpZL2w&oe=66AA2BD2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=kNCSCPZWXT8Q7kNvgEsqVxz&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA_dtItLVaq-vRsF7k5fXQqsR4vjs3cN314ujVfoXnaLw&oe=66AA1709)
